summary: Elliot, Boog and all of the beloved woodland creatures are back in a brand new comedy adventure.
cast: Donny Lucas|Will Townsend|Melissa Sturm|Trevor Devall|Garry Chalk|Brian Drummond|Kathleen Barr|Lee Tockar|Shannon Chan-Kent|Michelle Murdocca|Lorne Cardinal|Peter Kelamis|Maruti Garikiparthi|Maddie Taylor|Frank Welker
title: Colegas en el bosque: Una aventura de miedo
